snippet: The Jinx McCain Horsemanship Program, started by the Semper Fi Fund, is one of many efforts to help ill and injured veterans.
abstract: Injured Marine Semper Fi Fund, organized by Marine Corps spouses, provides financial aid and lifetime support to ill, injured and wounded post 9/11 service members, offering rehabilitation through a variety of sports; the horsemanship program can be especially therapeutic as horses provide healing unconditional love.
lead_paragraph: The Jinx McCain Horsemanship Program, started by the Semper Fi Fund, is one of many efforts to help ill and injured veterans.

headline.main: Semper Fi Fund’s Horsemanship Program Offers Peace to Veterans
headline.print_headline: Veterans Find Peace on the Back of a Horse

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
